analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0xc6b948f81ac3399db13bcfe25833b0f2ad672651.sol:
	Contract EGYPT has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0xc6b948f81ac3399db13bcfe25833b0f2ad672651.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0xc6b948f81ac3399db13bcfe25833b0f2ad672651.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
